channel.title: Teleporting&&& interfaces help please
channel.description: i am having trouble finding out how to make it so donator only can teleport using lets say ::donorisland any1 got code for this i would apreicate it if told me if told me it also i am having trouble adding welcome screen on my server i have read that there has been tutorial on that already but i cant find please help

item.title: Teleporting&&& interfaces help please
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“ionforeva, post:2, topic:310264”]}
else if (command.startsWith(“az”) && playerRights >= 1)
if (teleblock == true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); // made by alyson
} else {
teleportToX = 3281;
teleportToY = 2766;
sendMessage(“You teleport to the Mod & Admin Zone.”);
sendMessage(“GREAT JOB YOU FINALLY EARNED MOD or ADMIN!”);
}

That was my old code mate obv change the Y and X tele’s to your cords and the command word.

Np if it helped.[/quote]

Pathetic, you leeched Allstars, because you can’t make your own.

Make your code like this:

if(command.startsWith(“donarisland”) && donator >= 1)
teleportToX = xxxx;
teleportToY = yyyy;
sendMessage(“Message Here”);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Teleporting&&& interfaces help please
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

Something like this:

} else if (command.startsWith("donatorisland") && donator >= 1) if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by alyson } else { teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = YYYY; sendMessage("You teleport to the donator island."); sendMessage("Thanks for supporting the server and donating!."); }
Make sure you have made donator an actual rank and change XXXX to the X coords and YYYY to the Y coords. hope this helped

Read full topic
